New Records: Breel Embolo scored his first international goal for Switzerland after returning from injury.
Michel Aebischer scored his first international goal in this match.
Key Match Events: Kwadwo Duah scored his first goal for Switzerland on his second appearance.
Breel Embolo scored the winning goal in injury time to secure the victory for Switzerland.
Hungary improved after halftime with Barnabas Varga scoring a goal.
Pre-Game Insights: Switzerland targeted left wing-back Milos Kerkez in their strategy.
Hungary's manager Marco Rossi noted tactical issues with their 3-4-3 system against Switzerland's 3-5-2.
Post-Match Reflections: Switzerland's manager praised Breel Embolo's performance and the team's resilience.
Hungary's manager acknowledged their struggles against Switzerland's quick transitions.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was part of Euro 2024.
Switzerland's historical performance in major tournaments was mentioned.
Others: The match was played at the Cologne Stadium.
